dependencies.description: External WGl and Windows OpenGL emulation representation in Spack
dependencies.name: gl

dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.
dependencies.name: pil

dependencies.description:
PulseAudio is a sound system for POSIX OSes, meaning that it is a proxy
for your sound applications. PulseAudio is a sound system for POSIX
OSes, meaning that it is a proxy for your sound applications. It allows
you to do advanced operations on your sound data as it passes between
your application and your hardware. Things like transferring the audio
to a different machine, changing the sample format or channel count and
mixing several sounds into one are easily achieved using a sound server.
dependencies.name: pulseaudio

dependencies.description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2
dependencies.name: py-future

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
OpenAI Gym is a toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement
learning algorithms. This is the gym open-source library, which gives
you access to a standardized set of environments.
dependent_to.name: py-gym

dependent_to.description: Import, export, process, analyze and view triangular meshes
dependent_to.name: py-trimesh

description:
pyglet is a cross-platform windowing and multimedia library for Python

name: py-pyglet
